rukus.text: 77|41|Ba rosti, ki [dar on ruz] parhezkoron dar sojaho va [kanori] casmaho qaror dorand
77|43|[Ba onho gufta mesavad] «Ba podosi on ci mekarded, guvoro ʙixured va ʙijosomed»
77|46|«[Ej kofiron, dar in dunjo] andake ʙixured va ʙahra gired, zero sumo gunahgored»
77|48|Va hangome ki ʙa onho gufta savad: «[Namoz ʙiguzored va] ruku' kuned, [namoz nameguzorand va] ruku' namekunand
77|50|[Agar mardum ʙa in Qur'on imon nameovarand] Pas, ʙa'd az on ʙa kadom suxan imon meovarand
